function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Collaboration with outsiders may introduce new contagious diseases to the local community or staff members.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within the community and among staff members, leading to illness and disruption of operations.","Mitigation":"Implement strict health screenings for all outsiders before they interact with the local community or staff. Provide health education and resources for preventing the spread of diseases. Enforce quarantine protocols if necessary.","Technologies":"Health screening tools, telemedicine for remote health consultations, educational materials on disease prevention.","People":"Local community, staff members, trainees.","Owner":"Nomad lodges, local health authorities, medical professionals."},{"Description":"High level of staff and management rotation may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases among different groups of employees.","Impact":"Increased potential for the spread of contagious diseases as employees rotate between different communities and groups.","Mitigation":"Develop strict hygiene protocols for staff members, provide comprehensive training on disease prevention, and ensure regular health screenings for all employees. Limit contact between rotating employees when possible.","Technologies":"Hygiene training materials, health screening tools, remote work technology for reduced physical contact.","People":"Staff members, management, trainees.","Owner":"Nomad lodges, local health authorities, staff supervisors."}]}
